item.title: Simple Eyelet Skirt
item.description:
$45.00
This skirt is made with two layers of light white cotton. The top layer has floral eyelet notes, and the second layer keeps things a secret. Wide waist has a side tie cotton drawstring.

Measurements:

Waist/Hips ~ any size up to 42"

Length ~ 20"

item.title: Mushroom Bag
item.description:
$8.00
I've tried storing my mushrooms in paper bags, in their original containers (massive culinary no-no) and just plain threw 'em in the fridge.

Storing them in these fabric bags makes all the differnce in the world. Made with prewashed hemp/cotton muslin, trimmed with a fitting mushroom print cotton, and drawing closed with a dark brown grossgrain ribbon ~ they will keep your mushrooms fresh for far longer. I made myself one and tried it out before making more so they've been put to the test.

They are completely wash and dryable. 9" deep x 5" wide, bottom is squared to make plenty of room!

(Mushrooms not included!)

item.title: Summer Wishin' Top
item.description:
$40.00
This summery tank tunic top is made with an ivory floral print cotton, with a dark cocoa floral print cotton for the detailing. The bodice has elastic at the top and at the empire bodice. There is an aline cut to the body.

Measurements:

Bust ~ 28-36" across top (empire bust ~ 26-36")

Length ~ 22"

Shoulder straps ~ 16" front to back

item.title: Knotty Scarf
item.description:
$15.00
I was on a knitting bender one day, couldn't make up my mind what to use, and so I just used everything I had to make this delicacy.

In this scarf you will find quite the array of shiiny ribbons, hairy strings, fuzzy yarns, and warm colors.

66" long

Enjoy!

item.title: Fugly Pants
item.description:
$45.00
Yeah, I admit I had no clue where I was going when I started making these lounge pants, other than I was aiming for supa' freaky comfortable. I got the supa' freaky and definately the comfortable down on these bad boys.

I started out with all vintage fabrics. White terry, orange and purple arglyle mystery (i really don't know what it's made from but it's cozy), and a strip of plum velour. The wide waistband had a white cotton drawstring.

They are quite striking (in so many ways) but I can't believe how comfortable they are!

Measurements:

Drawstring Waist/hips ~ opens up to 42"

Inseam ~ 32"

Outseam ~ 44"

Rise ~ 12" (these are LOUNGE pants mind you)

item.title: Smokin' Elephant
item.description:
$25.00
One may as well sparkle as they wander.

This necklace involves small round blood jasper beads, itty bitty silver and cocoa seed beads, smoky faceted glass beads, some delightful red glass details, and a joyful pewter elephant. It measures 15" around, and is 9.5" long from the lobster claw clasp to the end of the elephant charm.

item.title: The Small Satchel
item.description:
$35.00
The perfect lil' companion for tossing your goodies into only to easily grab them up and haul around.

This satchel is made with a forest green wide whale cotton corduroy and is lined with an ivory cotton, and of a pink/peach cotton with a gold floral design. Inside you'll find a large pocket, along with a cell phone pocket and key ring equipped with a mini carabiner (no more purse dig to find the keys!)

Satchel measures 11" wide, 9" long, and 2.5" deep.

item.title: Reversible Wristlet - Ivory Cocoa Flowers
item.description:
$15.00
Lesson #3 that I learned on my honeymoon to Cabo ~

There are just only so many peso coins you can carry in your cleavage.

So ~ wristlets were brought to my attention. Sometimes you don't want to carry a purse, or a bag, and sometimes you just want a little functional accessory. These cute lil' satchels will hold a cell phone, an ID, whatever small necessity you may need, and of course, pesos.

They are reversible ~ so if one side doesn't fit your day, just flip it!

This wristlet was made with an ivory floral print cotton and a dark brown floral print cotton with a black grossgrain ribbon for the drawstring.

Measures ~ 5" wide x 4" deep (about 6" at the bottom)

item.title: Reversible Wristlet - Pink Fireworks
item.description:
$15.00
Lesson #3 that I learned on my honeymoon to Cabo ~

There are just only so many peso coins you can carry in your cleavage.

So ~ wristlets were brought to my attention. Sometimes you don't want to carry a purse, or a bag, and sometimes you just want a little functional accessory. These cute lil' satchels will hold a cell phone, an ID, whatever small necessity you may need, and of course, pesos.

They are reversible ~ so if one side doesn't fit your day, just flip it!

This wristlet was made with a hemp/cotton hand-dyed a soft pink by Etsy's own Kellis, a sparkled warm multi-hued satin, and a hand braided ribbon drawstring.

Measures ~ 5" wide x 4" deep (about 6" at the bottom)

item.title: Reversible Wristlet - Chocolate Mushrooms
item.description:
$15.00
Lesson #3 that I learned on my honeymoon to Cabo ~

There are just only so many peso coins you can carry in your cleavage.

So ~ wristlets were brought to my attention. Sometimes you don't want to carry a purse, or a bag, and sometimes you just want a little functional accessory. These cute lil' satchels will hold a cell phone, an ID, whatever small necessity you may need, and of course, pesos.

They are reversible ~ so if one side doesn't fit your day, just flip it!

This wristlet was made with a dark chocolate canvas like cotton, and a mushroom print cotton, with a vintage cotton white lace drawstring.

Measures ~ 5" wide x 4" deep (about 6" at the bottom)

item.title: Baby Blues -n- Patchwork Reversible Wristlet
item.description:
$15.00
Lesson #3 that I learned on my honeymoon to Cabo ~

There are just only so many peso coins you can carry in your cleavage.

So ~ wristlets were brought to my attention. Sometimes you don't want to carry a purse, or a bag, and sometimes you just want a little functional accessory. These cute lil' satchels will hold a cell phone, an ID, whatever small necessity you may need, and of course, pesos.

They are reversible ~ so if one side doesn't fit your day, just flip it!

This wristlet was made with a baby blue cotton corduroy, cotton patchwork of various cuteness, and a soft lacey ribbon for the drawstring.

Measures ~ 5" wide x 4" deep (about 6" at the bottom)

item.title: Teal Ocean Quilt Twin
item.description:
$45.00
The colors in this make me think of water...Florida actually...

These fabrics are teal multicolor, has soft teal green ties, and a bright blue cotton backing.

Size ~ 60x57"

item.title: Blue Dragonfly Quilt
item.description:
$60.00
This quilt is made with a blend of blue fabrics, has dark blue ties, and is backed with a light blue cotton.

Size ~ 80x98"

item.title: Multi-hued Baby Quilt
item.description:
$20.00
This quilt is made with an array of colorful fabrics with a tan sashing and ivory ties. The backing is a tan floral fabric.

Size ~ 56x46"

item.title: Baby Blues Quilt
item.description:
$20.00
This quilt is made with a variety of blue, white, and turquise fabrics. It has dark blue ties, and sports a red and plaid flannel backing.

Size ~ 52 x 46"

item.title: Cowl Back Top
item.description:
$30.00
This is another very cozy top. I used an ivory vintage poly fabric with a simple straight pattern weave and appliqued a hand~drawn freeform design of sea blue linen and brown linen with sequins. There is a slight cowl neckline and a deep plunging cowl back. Wear it alone or layer this lovely!

This top will fit up to a size Large.

item.title: Mother Of Pearl Multi Strand Necklace
item.description:
$20.00
This lovely involves little wooden beads, mother of pearl chips, copper dyed freshwater pearls, and mother of pearl spears. It has a silver colored claw clasp.

Length: 17" short strand
25" long strand

item.title: Black Porcelain Rectangle Necklace
item.description:
$18.00
Soft matte black glass seed beads, white and brown porceline rectangle beads. Features a twisted "silver" toggle.

Length: 19"

item.title: Random Agate Necklace
item.description:
$22.00
This is my answer to making up your mind when you can't! I just took of mismatched beads, ditties without a home, mixed 'em up all together, and lo and behold, it became this adorable earthy necklace. It secures with a toggle clasp. Look close, you'll find glass, wood, agates, silver notions, goldstone, bone, stones, and shells...and don't miss the vintage agate pendant!

Length: 16" end to end
